Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with plasmids encoding LRRK2-G2019S or LRRK2-R1441C.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased kinase activity observed in LRRK2-G2019S compared to wild-type.
Enhanced kinase activity detected in LRRK2-R1441C compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent transfections were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each transfection was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2-expressing cells served as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells served as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used to compare kinase activity between variants and controls.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity within 10% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity exceeding 30% of wild-type levels.

Material used.Description: Lysates from HEK293 cells expressing LRRK2-G2019S or LRRK2-R1441C were analyzed.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased LRRK2 protein levels observed in G2019S-expressing cells.
Elevated LRRK2 protein levels detected in R1441C-expressing cells.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent transfections were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each transfection was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2-expressing cells served as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells served as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used to compare protein levels between variants and controls.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: LRRK2 protein levels within 15% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: LRRK2 protein levels exceeding 35% of wild-type levels.

Material used.Material Name: Post-mortem brain tissue from Parkinson's disease patients
Material used.Description: Brain tissue sections were immunostained with anti-LRRK2 antibodies.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased LRRK2 phosphorylation observed in G2019S carriers compared to non-carriers.
Enhanced LRRK2 phosphorylation detected in R1441C carriers compared to non-carriers.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.
